nodes.text: Silverbacks were a subspecies of the sentient Wookiee species on Kashyyyk. Two silverbacks were Wullffwarro and his son Kitwarr, who were taken into slavery by the Galactic Empire before being rescued by the Spectres.

Silverbacks were first mentioned in the 2011 Legends video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and were canonized by The Rebellion Begins, a 2014 junior novelization of Star Wars Rebels: Spark of Rebellion.
